description: This file defines a React functional component called LeaderboardSidebar that renders a sidebar section for displaying a leaderboard or related real-time information within a quiz application. It includes static styling and placeholder content, with potential for extension to handle real-time data via websocket.

methods.name: LeaderboardSidebar()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a styled sidebar with a header and placeholder text for real-time scores or leaderboard data.
